text:
### Integrate with Google Analytics 4

If your subscription includes Vitae, you can choose to use Google Analytics 4
to create a web stream for Vitae course finder website to track over the
activities on that website. To use Google Analytics 4 to track the activities
on a website, you must complete the following settings to get ready for the
data collection.
